nodes.text: The Battle of Cerea was a month-long battle that took place on the Galactic Republic world of Cerea. The paradise world was ravaged by Commerce Guild forces until defeated by the Republic. The battle ended when Bo-Ro-Tara was assassinated by Gossam Commandos. It was also during the battle that the Cerean Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi lost his family.
